Mattia Loszach created this website. Want to know something about his education or qualifications?
Mattia Loszach is from Austria and was born in 2003.

patterns: Where did he go to school?
Where did Mattia go to school?
responses: First he attended the 'Global Education Primary School' in Vienna (2010-2014). Afterwards, Mattia went to 'GRG XIII Wenzgasse 7' in Vienna (2014-2022) and did his A-levels.
His Elementary School was named 'GEPS 13' and promoted compentence regarding the English language. The 'GRG Wenzgasse 7' was his High School, there he chose a focus on the study of economics.
Mattia loves sports. For example soccer (he played in a club for about 10 years), tennis (he is part of the club TC Blau Weiss), cycling, skiing, basketball, ...
Mattia loves to be creative. Therefore, he's quit into coding, designing and worked a lot with programs as Blender, Final Cut Pro, Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro, After Effects.
Science and Maths are two of his biggest interests. No matter if it's about science magazines or interesting videos, he can't stop enquiring about those topics.
Mattia loves music and has played the piano since he was 8 years old. Furthermore, he likes to work with programs as Fruity Loops or Garageband and create his own music.
Mattia graduated in 2022 and chose the subjects Mathematics, Physics, English and German. Want to enquire about the results? Just take a look at Mattia's 'Portfolio'.
Here are the results of his six final exams: Maths - written (1), Maths - oral (1), Physics - oral (1), English - written (2), English - oral (1), German - written (1). Austrian graduation system.

patterns: Tell me about his academic paper
responses: In 2022 Mattia chose the topic 'Smart Cities' for his academic paper. Interested? Take a look at the 'Portfolio'-Section, there you'll find a PDF-Version.

Mattia's VWA/academic paper is named 'Smart Cities - Die St√§dte der Zukunft' and is a description of different Smart-City-Models, -Patterns and -Characteristics. Moreover, a small insight into the Smart City Wien.

Mattia's first language is German. Due to his attendance regarding the GEPS 13 elemantery school and further elective subjects/programs he is able to speak English fluently. He also knows a little Spanish.
He can speak English fluently. German is his first language and he also knows a little Spanish.
Email address: mattia.loszach@gmail.com. Instagram: @mattialoszach. Phone number: Contact via email first. Further contact options will follow!

patterns: What can I find on the website
responses: This is a personal (portfolio) website from Mattia Loszach. Take a look at the 'Portfolio'-Section (education, qualifications) and the 'Updates'-Section (News, informations regarding the website and Mattia's life). Further changes and options will follow!
Enquire about Mattia and his life. There are also some easter eggs, take a look at the 'Update'-Section and find fun browser games!
Mattia was born in 2003 in Vienna.
Mattia's birthday is the 18th of December in 2003 (in Vienna).
A lot of people describe him as a very creative person who thinks outside the box. His dedication and ambition enable him to work as hard as possible and be an essential part of almost every team.
One ability worth mentioning is his resilience and he is always willing to push himself beyond proven ability. Furthermore, he got great interpersonal, communication and organising skills.

he got a broad knowledge regarding computer science. Mattia has worked with coding languages as Java, Javascript, Python, PHP, Dart. In doing so, he has a lot of interesting experiences regarding programing projects (Backend-Integration, Webshops, Webdesign, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and Mobile Application Development).
He got a broad knowledge concerning computer science, designing and data processing. He speaks German, English and a little Spanish. Furthermore, experiences regarding Maths, science and engineering.

patterns: Tell me about his favourite film
responses: Mattia loves Christopher Nolan's films 'Tenet' and 'Interstellar'. Furthermore, action movies as Spiderman and Batman.

patterns: Tell me about his favourite music
responses: Mattia loves HipHop and Rap music. He enjoys listening to artists as Kanye West or Travis Scott. When relaxing he also likes Jazz and more classical music.
When talking about food, Mattia is pretty open-minded. He especially likes Italian, Japanese and American Meals.

patterns: What does he want to achieve?
responses: One day Mattia would like to become the founder of a great corporate that enables people to live a more happy and sustainable life while keeping an eye on our and the following generation's future.
Mattia's biggest goal is to leave something to posterity that he will be remembered and thanked for long after his demise.

patterns: What can you help me with?
responses: Don't know what to ask? No problem! You can ask me about Mattia's qualifications, hobbies, film preferences or his education.
